meanings.definition: Resembling a rock in appearance or hardness.
meanings.sent1: The statue had a rocklike texture, feeling rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The boulder was so heavy and rocklike that it was impossible to move.
meanings.sent3: The rocklike cake was so hard, even the strongest teeth couldn't break it!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as rocklike as the mountain standing tall against the wind.
meanings.sent5: The rocklike fortress stood strong against the enemy's attacks.

meanings.definition: Firm and unyielding like a rock.
meanings.sent1: His rocklike resolve never wavered, no matter the challenges he faced.
meanings.sent2: The old tree had roots that were rocklike, firmly anchored in the ground.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, his rocklike determination made him a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent4: Her rocklike faith in her abilities carried her through the toughest times.
meanings.sent5: The team's unity was as rocklike as the foundation of a building.
